job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a Software Engineer III to join our growing engineering team and contribute in building out the next generation of our cloud analytics platform The ideal candidate for this position shall be able to analyze and develop software in our critical datadriven software platforms in order to meet the needs of our external stakeholders while adhering to our clients software development processes The ideal candidate is a handson technically savvy individual with experience in cloudbased architectureinfrastructureppThe Software Engineer is responsible for the software development process including the research design programming and testing of computer software The Software Engineer will also help to develop critical products for our clients and offer technical support The Software Engineer is expected to be proficient in application of theories and principles of Computer ScienceppnbspppuEssential Duties amp ResponsibilitiesupulliMentor support amp develop software engineers by providing advice and coachingliliMaintains exceptional communication skills with an ability to effectively listen to other team members amp managementliliMeasure system performance and health determine bottlenecks and recommendimplement optimizationsliliImprove operations by conducting systems analysis recommending changes in policies and proceduresliliCapable of delivering on priorities in a timely fashion with limited supervisionliliContinuously updating job knowledge by studying stateoftheart development tools programming techniques and computing equipment participating in educational opportunities reading professional publications maintaining personal networks participating in professional organizationliliPassionate about great technologies especially open source with willingness to go deep into the technologyliliResearchlearn new technologiesframeworks to be able to teach them to the teamliulpbrppuTech StackupulliUnit TestingliliCloud Infrastructure AWS andor AzureliliEntity Framework  ORMsliliSQL experienceliliHas worked in an agile environmentliliCliliNETnbspliulpnbspppuDetailed Work ActivityupulliPerform intensive validation amp verification testingliliCreatively break down and solve complex problems using exceptional analytical skillsliliWrite clean readable maintainable and reusable code ensuring that all code meets program requirementsliliProvide feedback on technical and operational feasibility of proposed software projectssolutions by evaluating analysis problem definition requirements solution development and proposed solutionsliliDevelop software solutions by examining information needs consulting with stakeholders analyzing systems flow data consumption patterns and work processes investigating problem areasliliMake informed decisions quickly and take ownership of services and applications at scaleliliDocument and demonstrate solution design by developing documentation flowcharts layouts diagrams and chartsliliWork closely with project team members to translate requirements into a cohesive design strategyliulpuEducational RequirementsupulliBS in Computer Science Software Engineering Computer Information Systems or a relevant field with 5 years of professional related experience OR 8 years of related professional experience in lieu of a degreeliul
